snippet: Work on the facility that directs sewage was interrupted by Hurricane Sandy, and plans were modified to reflect lessons learned from the storm, but the project is still expected to be completed this year, officials announced.
abstract: Work on the facility that directs sewage was interrupted by Hurricane Sandy, and plans were modified to reflect lessons learned from the storm, but the project is still expected to be completed this year, officials announced.

headline.main: Upgrades on Schedule for Gowanus Canal Pumping Station Despite Hurricane
